short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds right click context menu for searching Tolkien terms and optionally hides/redirects LotR Fandom results.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is dedicated to fans of J.R.R. Tolkien and his works.

Features:
* Highlight any keyword on any website, right click and select "Search in Tolkien Gateway" to immediately be taken to the respective article.
* Curious what chapter and page a particular quote comes from? Simply highlight any quote from Tolkien's works, right click, and select "Lookup Tolkien Reference" to be directed to the reference on the Digital Tolkien Project.
* Optionally, you can choose to hide LotR Fandom results from Google, or simply redirect LotR Fandom's articles to the relevant article on Tolkien Gateway.

Coming Soon:
* The ability to type "Aule" or any Tolkien term which needs accents, and the extension will automatically convert it to "AulÃ«" to eliminate the need for Alt Codes.

Have a feature idea? Let us know!
